at.technikum.ode.memory

Class MemoryGameBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.technikum.ode.memory.MemoryGameBuilder

  • public final class MemoryGameBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class which allows to specify an optional parameter to limit the number of pairs used by MemoryGame in a fluent way.

    • Method Detail

      • maxNumberOfPairs

        public MemoryGameBuilder maxNumberOfPairs(int maxNumberOfPairs)
        Parameters:
        maxNumberOfPairs - upper bound for the number of pairs used by at.technikum.ode.memory game. The effective number of pairs used might be lower and depends on the number of available images files
        Returns:
        the instance of the MemoryGameBuilder

      • buildMemoryGame

        public MemoryGame buildMemoryGame()
        Returns:
        The MemoryGame built with the specified values (default or set via fluent api)
